sentences.en: Blood from his cut lip trickled over his chin.
sentences.cn: 血从他划伤的嘴唇涌出顺着下巴往下流。

sentences.en: Foden rasped a hand across his chin.
sentences.cn: 福登用手蹭得下巴刺刺响。

sentences.en: He cupped her chin in the palm of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他用手心托着她的下巴。

sentences.en: He had a small tuft of hair on his chin.
sentences.cn: 他下巴上有一小撮胡须。

sentences.en: He had clear blue eyes and a jutting chin.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和凸出的下巴。

sentences.en: He had long unkempt hair and a stubbly chin.
sentences.cn: 他的头发又长又乱，脸上胡子拉碴。
他若有所思地抚摸着下巴。

sentences.en: His ears wiggled if you scratched his chin.
sentences.cn: 如果你挠他的下巴，他的耳朵就会摆动。

sentences.en: keep your chin up, we're not lost yet.

sentences.cn: 马丁若有所思地摸了一下下巴。

sentences.en: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁渍染黄了他的下巴和手指。
她若有所思地抚摩着下巴。

sentences.en: She tilted her face to kiss me quickly on the chin.
sentences.cn: 她侧过脸飞快地在我下巴上亲了一下。

sentences.en: She was a plain-looking woman with a weak chin.
There he stood: hair in wild tangles, dark stubble shadowing his chin.
sentences.cn: 他站在那儿，头发乱成一团，下巴上一片黑胡茬。

sentences.en: There was a smear of gravy on his chin.

words.tran_cn: 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作

phrases.tran_cn: 勇敢忍受不幸；坦然接受灾祸

trans.tran_en: the front part of your face below your mouth

trans.tran_cn: 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作
